Description: Ostracon, fragment of the shoulder-section of a brown pottery ribbed vessel, the fabric is partially grey-black in section, the interior is spotted with a dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a self-slip and remains of one line of Coptic text written in black ink and two red-painted slashes.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394422) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394422)
